Description:
Detects Access to Domain Group Policies stored in SYSVOL

Author: Markus Neis, Jonhnathan Ribeiro, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious SYSVOL Domain Group Policy Access
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%\sysvol\%' and command like '%\policies\%')
